channel.title: Anasagar Lake on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Anasagar Lake on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Ajmer-Pushkar
item.description: Early morning reached Jaipur from Jaisalmer by train. This time our cab driver from hotel (Madhuban) was waiting and on reaching hotel relaxed for while. Before leaving for Jodhpur, we have fixed with Mr. Singh (our reliable cab driver) for this trip to Ajmer-Pushkar. As usual, he was there on time; left hotel room around 8.00am. Had our breakfast on way at small neat and clean dhaba. Road being 6 lane; had very comfort drive and was hardly crowded.
